objectives: Students will discuss travel and tourism using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Fantasy themed scenarios related to travel and tourism
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining travel and tourism content with Fantasy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore travel and tourism through a Fantasy lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a magical or fantastical situation involving travel and tourism

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to travel and tourism in a fantasy context
Students engage in fantasy themed role-play about travel and tourism using expert register
Students create original fantasy themed content about travel and tourism in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe travel and tourism in a Fantasy scenario?
What magical or enchanted might be involved in travel and tourism?
Can you create a Fantasy story about travel and tourism?
How does travel and tourism change when viewed through a Fantasy perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this fantasy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Fantasy situation involving travel and tourism
roles: Character A: Using expert register in fantasy context
Character B: Responding in expert register within fantasy theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Fantasy theme: Magic, mythical creatures, imaginary worlds

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Fantasy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
